citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
While the facility provides enrichment for birds, there is no written plan enrichment plan for birds. A written enrichment
plan for birds is required to ensure that birds are being provided with adequate and appropriate enrichment. Correct by
April 1, 2024 by documenting an enrichment plan for birds that is approved by the Attending Veterinarian and addresses
the birds' physical environment, social needs, and special considerations for young birds, social species of birds housed
alone, and birds showing signs of psychological distress.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
While the facility provides enrichment for birds, there is no written plan enrichment plan for birds. A written enrichment 
plan for birds is required to ensure that birds are being provided with adequate and appropriate enrichment. Correct by 
April 1, 2024 by documenting an enrichment plan for birds that is approved by the Attending Veterinarian and addresses 
the birds' physical environment, social needs, and special considerations for young birds, social species of birds housed 
alone, and birds showing signs of psychological distress. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
